QuestData.Title: Explorers' League Document (4 of 6)
QuestData.Description: The document bears the Explorers' League crest and seems to detail transport routes utilized by the league into and out of Loch Modan. Sooty smudges lead you to believe it was likely stolen by the Dark Iron spies in the area.$B$BYou recall mention of missing documents at the Explorers' League building in Thelsamar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the Explorers' League Document to Torren Squarejaw in Thelsamar.
QuestData.RewardText: Ug, I can't believe they got their hands on our transport routes - that was just asking for trouble!!$B$BThank you for getting this back to us before they were able to do much with it! You probably saved us a lot of heartache. Please accept some coin as a reward for your efforts.
